attributes.action: raising awareness week in september for mitocondrial disease
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like to help raise awareness in the uk of the disease mitrocondrial disease which is a rare disease and is a horrible disease to die of it affects many children and adults i no they have the awareness in america my reason for this is because my 11 month old passed away three days before his first b-day of this disease and there isn't much awareness out there or funding
